name: Trash Game (Ji9sw)
description:
0.5.0

Trash Game is one of the first games I've ever made, it is a top-down "platformer I guess you could call it, it has 6 levels and for me it takes around 2 minutes to complete, on each level you go around and collect the trash bag and proceed to the next level. 

This is a very trash game about collecting trash and so I called it trash game

If you want the source code comment below and I'll upload the unity project

If you run MacOS, Linux or Want me to upload in HTML so you can run in browser please comment to let me know, I'll try to respond ASAP

The game development is on hold because the project is really messy and its hard to continue working on it, I've basically moved on to other projects because this game was basically a test to see what I could do, I am already developing other games that are already better because of what this game taught me.
